adrFormatAddress: 4880 Broadway, New York, NY 10034-3135, USA

originalText.text: I'm incredibly impressed by my experience at Inwood Auto Service. Roberto was so kind, professional, and informative that I knew I had to share a review with the community. The price for service was more than fair, and Roberto took the time to explain precisely what the problem was and how he approached fixing it. It was my first time as a customer but it certainly won't be my last.

text.text: I'm incredibly impressed by my experience at Inwood Auto Service. Roberto was so kind, professional, and informative that I knew I had to share a review with the community. It was my first time as a customer but it certainly won't be my last.

originalText.text: I’m so grateful I happened to be back in the neighborhood again today.  I had just returned from a long cross country trip and did my post trip inspection.  I stopped by and Stephanie was incredibly helpful and Jerry got me in this afternoon for an oil change.  The entire staff was very cordial and pleasant.  It’s a great atmosphere and even the fuel prices are better than my area.  I cannot say enough about the staff, pricing and efficiency of this shop.  I highly recommend Jerry and Inwood Auto for your vehicle maintenance and repairs.

originalText.text: So grateful for this local auto repair shop. Roberto, the lead mechanic, and his staff have always done a great job when I need a car repair - whether it's been a muffler issue or, for today's case, my a/c not working properly. They did the repair quickly, at a good price, and with a smile. Everything's working great now. And, I got my inspection done without any issues.

text.text: So grateful for this local auto repair shop. Roberto, the lead mechanic, and his staff have always done a great job when I need a car repair - whether it's been a muffler issue or, for today's case, my a/c not working properly. They did the repair quickly, at a good price, and with a smile. Everything's working great now. And, I got my inspection done without any issues.

originalText.text: Recommended to Roberto! Roberto has great customer service and was quick to diagnose the issue with my car. Prices were on point and service was quick!  I will add him to my list of mechanics!

text.text: Recommended to Roberto! Roberto has great customer service and was quick to diagnose the issue with my car. Prices were on point and service was quick!  I will add him to my list of mechanics!

originalText.text: Great service and these mechanics are so experienced. They can tell you what's wrong with the car just by what you tell them, they always confirm for free and are the most reasonable price around. I recommend them to all of my friends! I have been going there for over 8 years and have never regretted it. I have had everything from oil changes, inspections, changed my brakes, shocks, ignition key replaced and transmission work done here. Never regretted it.
